title: Partnership
title2: How to become a representative of TM SHE
paragraph_1: We provide wholesale terms of cooperation for studios, schools and shops. With wholesale cooperation, we provide:
paragraph_2: How to become an EXCLUSIVE representative of TM SHE in your city? To get detailed information on the terms of the representative office, you need to fill out the form "Send an application" and we will contact you within an hour.
connect: Or you can contact the manager directly by phone +7 (915) 565-20-27

partnership.title: Partnership
partnership.paragraph_1: For detailed information on the conditions of representation you need to fill out a form and we will contact you within one hour.
